ygData.messageBody:
First off it ywould be pointless to make a quest item NO TRADE since you
could then drop it on the ground for someone else to pick up.

Second, my guess is that allowing us to place NO DROP items just in the
bank may be more difficult than it seems. Coding wise they probably just
have a check to see that where you place a NO DROP item or container with a
NO DROP item is somewhere other than on your personal inventory. There may
not be an easy way at that point to discern between the bank and some other
location. Then again they simply may not want to make the effort...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
